parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The requested page of the result. Defaults to 1 if not supplied.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The size of a page. Defaults to 50 if not supplied.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. Supported properties are id,name,hash,type,createdBy,createdByType. The property parameters containing arbitrary key/value pairs can be searched.

parameters.name: keepExisting
parameters.description: If the keepExisting parameter is set to false, the not referenced objects will be deleted

parameters.name: chunkSize
parameters.description: The size of a chunk. Defaults to 50 if not supplied.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The requested page of the result. Defaults to 1 if not supplied.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The size of a page. Defaults to 50 if not supplied.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. Supported properties are id,state,taskDefinition,billingAccount,customerAccount,orderId,priority,description,assignee,category,creator,creationDate,targetResolutionDate,productOrder. The property parameters containing arbitrary key/value pairs can be searched.

parameters.name: scroll
parameters.description: If set to true, requests a result containing a `scrollId` to continue scrolling through the result.

parameters.name: scrollId
parameters.description: The requested scroll id to continue scrolling through the result. Ignored if not provided.

oauth2ClientCredentialAuthentication.description: Client credentials flow configuration for the Infonova Keycloak.

oauth2ResourceOwnerPasswordCredentialAut.description: Resource Owner Password Credentials flow configuration for the Infonova Keycloak.
